patthana14.30:1.1: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.30:2.1: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.30:3.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.30:4.1: Savicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.30:5.1: Avicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.30:6.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
